item.title: Adjustments API
item.author: girish@photoveda.pro (Girish Venkatachalam)
item.description: Get API Key Adjust gamma Parameter Type Description name String Type of work gamma Integer Gamma value Sample code Curl curl -H 'APIKEY: INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE' \ -F 'file=@/path/to/file.jpg' \ -f 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6&crop=true' \ -o out.png Python import requests response = requests.post( 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6', files={'file': open('/path/to/file.jpg', 'rb')}, headers={'APIKEY': 'INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE'}, ) Node.js var request = require('request'); var fs = require('fs'); request.post({ url: 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6', formData: { file: fs.createReadStream('/path/to/file.jpg') }, headers: { 'APIKEY': 'INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE' }, encoding: null }, function(error, response, body) { // console.

item.title: Blend Image API
item.author: girish@photoveda.pro (Girish Venkatachalam)
item.description: Get API Key 1a. Adjust gamma (Binary stream) Parameter Type Description name String Type of work gamma Integer Gamma value Sample code Curl curl -H 'APIKEY: INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE' \ -F 'file=@/path/to/file.jpg' \ -f 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6&crop=true' \ -o out.png Python import requests response = requests.post( 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6', files={'file': open('/path/to/file.jpg', 'rb')}, headers={'APIKEY': 'INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE'}, ) Node.js var request = require('request'); var fs = require('fs'); request.post({ url: 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6', formData: { file: fs.createReadStream('/path/to/file.jpg') }, headers: { 'APIKEY': 'INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE' }, encoding: null }, function(error, response, body) { // console.

item.description: Get API Key 1a. Adjust gamma (Binary stream) Parameter Type Description name String Type of work gamma Integer Gamma value Sample code Curl curl -H 'APIKEY: INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE' \ -F 'file=@/path/to/file.jpg' \ -f 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6&crop=true' \ -o out.png Python import requests response = requests.post( 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6', files={'file': open('/path/to/file.jpg', 'rb')}, headers={'APIKEY': 'INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE'}, ) Node.js var request = require('request'); var fs = require('fs'); request.post({ url: 'https://www.cutout.pro/api/v1/matting2?mattingType=6', formData: { file: fs.createReadStream('/path/to/file.jpg') }, headers: { 'APIKEY': 'INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE' }, encoding: null }, function(error, response, body) { // console.

item.author: girish@photoveda.pro (Girish Venkatachalam)
item.description: What is Progress-up? Uploading gif A HTML5 multiple files Upload plugin with progress bar indicator and file preview. It uses the HTTP File API to show continuous progress. Now available for Angular Vue Svelte React in addition to vanilla Javascript. A sample screenshot of the preview function. More stats Detailed instructions Developer docs Live demo Vue.js Angular React Svelte Why should you care? If you allow multiple large files upload then a progress indicator is a cool way to give user feedback.

item.title: Screenshots of Progress-up
item.author: girish@photoveda.pro (Girish Venkatachalam)
item.description: Some screenshots of progress-up Banned files Before upload Dark mode preview After upload Help tab Help tab Drag and drop Uploading gif Main tab One more preview Setup tab Stats tab More stats Progress bar update setup tab
